wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Davis (born 4 November 1960) is a British fencer from Northern Ireland. He competed in the foil events at the 1988 and 1992 Summer Olympics.

Jonathan Davis (born 1971) is American musician, and lead singer of the band Korn.
Jonathan Davis may also refer to:
*Jonathan Davis (journalist) (born 1954), British author, editor and journalist specialising in finance
*Q-Tip (musician) (born 1970), North American entertainer, born Jonathan Davis
